enb_long_title: Sixth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: During the first week of negotiations, delegates met six times in contact group meetings as well as in 'informal informal' consultations, to consider the Co- Chairs' revised text on a draft framework to enhance meaningful and effective actions under UNFCCC Article 4.5 (development and transfer of technology).

The first week's negotiations focused on themes in the framework relating to technology needs assessment, technology information, and enabling environments, as well as capacity building and mechanisms for technology transfer.
Following this, a revised text containing many brackets was presented to COP-6 by the SBSTA on Monday, 20 November.

During the second week of negotiations, development and transfer of technologies was considered in high-level informal discussions as part of President Pronk's cluster of crunch issues contained in his 'Box A.
' However, high-level negotiations during the second week failed to produce agreement, and text on this issue - still containing brackets - will be considered again at the resumed session of COP-6.
